description: My place is close to great neighborhood bars, restaurants, and coffee shops. Clinton Hill is the perfect area when wanting to stay local and at the same time have an easy commute to Manhattan and Williamsburg. You’ll love my place because of It is a very light and spacious apartment in a safe and quiet building. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers.
name: Clinton Hill - Centrally located, light and cozy!
